summary: Melt down weapons, armor, and miscellaneous items back down into ingots.
descriptionHtml:
Melt down weapons, armor, and miscellaneous items back down into ingots.
Not much else to say, except to list what is covered so far. If you think I\'m missing something, please tell me in the comments. Hearthfire and Dawnguard support will be coming this Christmas.
1.0-
Equipment:
Iron Gear
Steel Gear
Scaled Gear
Imperial Gear
Dwarven Gear
Elven Gear
Glass Gear
Ebony Gear
Daedric Gear
Ancient Nord Gear
Draugr Gear
Leather Gear
Blades Gear
Fur Gear

Junk:
Silver Bowls
Arentino Family Plate
Broom
Buckets
Cast Iron Pots
Candlesticks
Clothes Iron
Embalming Tools
Fork
Knife
Flagon
TOO MUCH TO LIST

Note: Most of this is melted down in the smelter, but some is \"melted\" in the tanning rack or forge when it makes more sense. EX: Leather armor.
Note2: You need a perk to smelt down anything. The second stage of the perk allows you to smelt secondary metals out of armor and weapons and also melt down miscellaneous objects.

Translations:
[url=http://modgames.net/load/247-1-0-14917]Russian[/url] by BustedUA
Also check out my other mod!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28466/][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28466-1-1355728416.png[/img][/url]
If you know how to resize this, let me know!
author: ThomasEston
